title: SLOW COOKER PORK POZOLE RECIPE
directions: In a 3- or 4-qt. slow cooker, combine the first nine ingredients; add pork. Cook, covered, on low 3-4 hours or until pork is tender.
Remove pork from slow cooker. Cut pork into bite-sized pieces; return to slow cooker. Serve with lime wedges and cilantro and, if desired, corn tortillas. Yield: 6 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (15-1/2 ounces) hominy, rinsed and drained
1 can (14-1/2 ounces) diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, undrained
Lime wedges and minced fresh cilantro
